text: Cerveja dourada com boa formação de espuma. Leve aroma floral e paladar amargo do lúpulo. Uma boa cerveja.
Lager de coloração palha, odor e sabor florais bem balanceada, acredito que no estilo.

Coloração clara,bom volume de espuma formando um creme de boa duração,aroma de cereais,pão,com um gostoso perfume herbal,sabor equilibrado com malte,lúpulo e álcool se interagindo muito bem,carbonação na medida,refrescante,retrogosto seco levemente amargo.Uma Helles nacional que perfila lado a lado com as germânicas,parabéns a Bamberg.
UPDATED: MAY 24, 2015 Golden with a small white head. Aroma is light malty with some herbal and floral notes. Taste is cereal and bread with herbal bitterness. Light bitter aftertaste.

Easy going beer. Pours just like expected, pale golden, translucid with a decent frothy head. Aroma is grassy, earthy and bready. Taste is quite bitter, some nice hops there, and pretty malty too, for a such a light beer. Finishes bitter and leaves almost no aftertaste. Better than what most german helles beers can offer. Id drink it all night.
Amarelo dourado, boa espuma, persistente, brilhante. Aroma herbal de lúpulo, pão, casca de pão. Amargor agradável do lúpulo herbáceo. Final seco e refrescante. Uma ótima cerveja e grata surpresa!

Goudgeel bier met mooie schuimkraag.
Zoet in de neus met honingtoets en bloemrijke hop.
Moutig in de mond met vanilletoets.
Bitterige afdronk met droge smaak.
Amarelo dourado com boa espuma branca e duradoura. Aroma maltado. Boa acidez e carbonatação. Ataque doce com amargor final. Boa drinkabilidade.

UPDATED: JUL 5, 2016 355ml bottle served in a Thumbler.
A: Pours a golden yellow color, slightly cloudy. Forms a big fluffly aired head. Good retention and many chunks of lace formed and left in the glass
S: Sweet. Sweet grains. Honey. Flowery hops
T: Sweet and grainy. Solid malts backbone with notes of honey, vanilla and hops which seems to be Czech. Bready. In overall, a dry taste. Good but moderate hop bitterness
M: Light body. Good carbonation. Grains aftertaste
O: Good drinkability. Well done beer. It seems that Bamberg is taking it seriously ;)
[ BA Review @ 8/16/2012 ]
Nice beer from small Brazilian brewery Bamberg. Bottled version tasted (also available on tap). Its safe to say most people used to drink mass-production lagers wouldnt dislike it.
Presença marcante de malte, cerveja bem equilibrada, alta formação de espuma, coloração dourada intensa, cereal
Todos os meus comentários antros foram perdidos, perdi a conta com 22 posts e não consigo acessar.
Boa formação de espuma, branca e duradoura. Amarelo ouro com pequenas bolhas e Translúcida. Aroma bem acentuado de malte.bem gostosa, paladar persistente e não muito amargo. Bem equilibrada.
Very nice munich helles, bread appears strongly in aroma and taste. hops are not easily notable. good drinkability.
White body with a creamy head. Smells like malt, but could be more strong. Soft easy to drink beer, no big susprises.
Brasil Brau 2011 on Tap. Pale yellow color with a fluffy white head keeps a good lacing for a long time. Aroma sweet hop and malt. Tasted is refreshing with some bitterness. mouthfeel is quite dry.
Boa cerveja. Burger Map. Precise experimenter novamente. Bom colarinho, espuma branca de boa formação. Amarelo ouro. Bastante saborosa.

On tap at Boteco Colarinho, Rio de Janeiro. Pours a slight cloudy light gold colour with a tall creamy white head. Aroma is sweet malt, bread with some floral hops. Taste is sweet malt then finishes with dry medium bitter hops. Quite a nice one, espeically the smoothness on tap.

average frothy white head. good lacing. mostly diminishing. clear thin dark yellow body. aroma: moderate hoppy honey, oatmeal, cereal. if: moderate sweet light bitter. ff: light sweet bitter. palate: light medium body, watery texture, lively carbonation metallic finish. totalmente BP, forte mel e leve amargor de lúpulo, 

Nota: 18 skol
